titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duties on salmeterol xinafoate (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9553)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 4-hydroxy-a-(((6-(4-phenylbutoxy)hexyl)amino)-methyl)-1, 3-benzenedimethanol, 1-hydroxy-2-naphthalenecarboxylate (salmeterol xinafoate bulk and dosage forms).
